maqras.text: Wa Tarakna Ba`đahum Yawma'idhin Yamuju Fi Ba`đin Wa Nufikha Fi As-Suri Fajama`nahum Jam`aan
Wa `Arađna Jahannama Yawma'idhin Lilkafirina `Arđaan
Al-Ladhina Kanat 'A`yunuhum Fi Ghita'in `An Dhikri Wa Kanu La Yastati`una Sam`aan
Afahasiba Al-Ladhina Kafaru 'An Yattakhidhu `Ibadi Min Duni 'Awliya'a 'Inna 'A`tadna Jahannama Lilkafirina Nuzulaan
Qul Hal Nunabbi'ukum Bil-'Akhsarina 'A`malaan
Al-Ladhina Đalla Sa`yuhum Fi Al-Hayaati Ad-Dunya Wa Hum Yahsabuna 'Annahum Yuhsinuna Sun`aan
Ula'ika Al-Ladhina Kafaru Bi'ayati Rabbihim Wa Liqa'ihi Fahabitat 'A`maluhum Fala Nuqimu Lahum Yawma Al-Qiyamati Waznaan
Dhalika Jaza'uuhum Jahannamu Bima Kafaru Wa Attakhadhu 'Ayati Wa Rusuli Huzuan
Inna Al-Ladhina 'Amanu Wa `Amilu As-Salihati Kanat Lahum Jannatu Al-Firdawsi Nuzulaan
Khalidina Fiha La Yabghuna `Anha Hiwalaan
Qul Law Kana Al-Bahru Midadaan Likalimati Rabbi Lanafida Al-Bahru Qabla 'An Tanfada Kalimatu Rabbi Wa Law Ji'na Bimithlihi Madadaan
Qul 'Innama 'Ana Basharun Mithlukum Yuha 'Ilayya 'Annama 'Ilahukum 'Ilahun Wahidun Faman Kana Yarju Liqa'a Rabbihi Falya`mal `Amalaan Salihaan Wa La Yushrik Bi`ibadati Rabbihi 'Ahadaan
Kaf-Ha-Ya-`Ayn-Sad
Dhikru Rahmati Rabbika `Abdahu Zakariya
Idh Nada Rabbahu Nida'an Khafiyaan
Qala Rabbi 'Inni Wahana Al-`Azmu Minni Wa Ashta`ala Ar-Ra'su Shaybaan Wa Lam 'Akun Bidu`a'ika Rabbi Shaqiyaan
Wa 'Inni Khiftu Al-Mawaliya Min Wara'i Wa Kanati Amra'ati `Aqiraan Fahab Li Min Ladunka Waliyaan
Yarithuni Wa Yarithu Min 'Ali Ya`quba Wa Aj`alhu Rabbi Rađiyaan
Ya Zakariya 'Inna Nubashiruka Bighulamin Asmuhu Yahya Lam Naj`al Lahu Min Qablu Samiyaan
Qala Rabbi 'Anna Yakunu Li Ghulamun Wa Kanat Amra'ati `Aqiraan Wa Qad Balaghtu Mina Al-Kibari `Itiyaan
Qala Kadhalika Qala Rabbuka Huwa `Alayya Hayyinun Wa Qad Khalaqtuka Min Qablu Wa Lam Taku Shay'aan
Qala Rabbi Aj`al Li 'Ayatan Qala 'Ayatuka 'Alla Tukallima An-Nasa Thalatha Layalin Sawiyaan
Fakharaja `Ala Qawmihi Mina Al-Mihrabi Fa'awha 'Ilayhim 'An Sabbihu Bukratan Wa `Ashiyaan
Ya Yahya Khudhi Al-Kitaba Biquwatin Wa 'Ataynahu Al-Hukma Sabiyaan
Wa Hananaan Min Ladunna Wa Zakaatan Wa Kana Taqiyaan
Wa Barraan Biwalidayhi Wa Lam Yakun Jabbaraan `Asiyaan
Wa Salamun `Alayhi Yawma Wulida Wa Yawma Yamutu Wa Yawma Yub`athu Hayyaan
Wa Adhkur Fi Al-Kitabi Maryama 'Idh Antabadhat Min 'Ahliha Makanaan Sharqiyaan
Fattakhadhat Min Dunihim Hijabaan Fa'arsalna 'Ilayha Ruhana Fatamaththala Laha Basharaan Sawiyaan
Qalat 'Inni 'A`udhu Bir-Rahmani Minka 'In Kunta Taqiyaan
Qala 'Innama 'Ana Rasulu Rabbiki Li'haba Laki Ghulamaan Zakiyaan
Qalat 'Anna Yakunu Li Ghulamun Wa Lam Yamsasni Basharun Wa Lam 'Aku Baghiyaan
Qala Kadhaliki Qala Rabbuki Huwa `Alayya Hayyinun Wa Linaj`alahu 'Ayatan Lilnnasi Wa Rahmatan Minna Wa Kana 'Amraan Maqđiyaan
